Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

Post.title: JAVA Monitor Tools
Post.author: Crab2Died
Post._content:
## . jps(JVM Process Status Tool)
### 1. 
   UNIXps
   
### 2. 
   - **-q**: ID
   - **-m**: 
   - **-l**: jarjar
   - **-v**: JVM

## . jstat(JVM Statistics Monitoring Tool)
### 1. 
       JIT 
   
### 2. 
   jstat[option vmid[interval[s|ms][count]]]
   **`jstat -class 14232(PID) 520() 4()`**
   
### 3. 
   - **-class**: 
   - **-gc**: javaEden2survivorGC
   - **-gccapacity**: -gcjava
   - **-gcutil**: -gcjava
   - **-gccase**: -gcutilGC
   - **-gcnew**: GC
   - **-gcnewcapacity**: -gcnew
   - **-gcold**: GC
   - **-gcoldcapacity**: -gcold
   - **-gcpermcapacity**: 
   - **-compiler**: JIT
   - **-printcompilation**: JIT
   
## . jinfo(Configuration Info for Java)
### 1. 
   
   
### 2. 
   jinfo [option] pid  `jinfo -flags 14232`
   
### 3. 
   - **-flag <name>**: to print the value of the named VM flag. (JVMname)
   - **-flag +/-<name>**: to enable or disable the named VM flag. (JVMname)
   - **-flag <name>=<value>**: to set the named VM flag to the given value. (JVM -Xmx=1024m)
   - **-flags**: to print VM flags. (JVM)
   - **-sysprops**: to print Java system properties. (`System.getProperties()`)

## . jmap(Memory Map for Java)
### 1. 

   (heapdumpdump)  
   dump:`-XX+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError`OOM`-XX+HeapDumpOnCtrlBreak`
   [Ctrl]+[Break]dumpLinuxkill -3 piddump
### 2. 
   jmap [option] vmid 
   
### 3. 
   - **-dump**: java,  `-dump:[live, ],format=b,file=<filename>`, live
   - **-finalizerinfo**: F-QueenFinalizerfinalize()Linux/Solaris
   - **-heap**: javaGCLinux/Solaris
   - **-histo**: 
   - **-permstat**: ClassLoaderLinux/Solaris
   - **-F**: -dump-FdumpLinux/Solaris
 
## . jhat(JVM Heap Analysis Tool)
### 1. 
   jmap(dump)
   
### 2. 
   jhat [-port 7001] <dumpfile>
   
### 3. 
   - **-port**: serverhost:port
   - **<file>**: dump
   - **-J<flag>**: ,: `-J-mx512m`

## . jstack(Stack Trace for Java)
### 1. 

   (threaddumpjavacore)  
   
      
   jstack
### 2. 
   jstack [option] vmid `jstack -l 14232`
   
### 3. 
   - **-F**: 
   - **-l**: 
   - **-m**: C/C++
   
### 4. 
  1. NewRunnableRunningWaitingTimed_WaitingBlockedDead  
   - **New**:   
   - **Runnable**thread.start()RunnableCPU  
   - **Running**  
   - **Waiting**thread.join()obj.wait()  
   - **Timed_Waiting**Thread.sleep(long)thread.join(long)obj.wait(long)WaitingTimed_Waiting  
   - **Blocked**  
   - **Dead**dead  
  2. jstack  
   - **Deadlock**  
   - **Waiting on condition**jstacktracesleep  
   - **Blocked**  
   - **Waiting on monitor entry**  
   - **in Object.wait()**obj.wait()  
   - Waiting on monitor entry  inObject.wait()Monitor Java
     Class monitor Monitor
      "Active Thread" "Waiting Thread" "Entry Set" "Wait Set"
      "Entry Set""Waiting for monitor entry" "Wait Set" "in Object.wait()"
      
### 5. 
   JDK1.5`java.lang.Thread``getAllStackTraces()``StackTraceElement`
   jstack

Post.title: Pseudo Distributed Hadoop Install
Post.author: Crab2Died
Post._content:
## 
### UbuntuJDK8Hadoop2.8.5
   [Ubuntu](https://www.ubuntu.com/download/desktop);
   [JDK,](https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html);
   [Hadoop2.8.5](http://hadoop.apache.org/)

### 
   1. apt `sudo apt-get update`
   2. SSHSSH
     - SSH `sudo apt-get install openssh-server`
     - SSH
      ```bash
      cd ~/.ssh/                            # ssh crab2died
      ssh-keygen -t rsa                     # 
      cat ./id_rsa.pub >> ./authorized_keys # 
      ssh crab2died                         # 
      ```
   3. hosts
      ```bash
      sudo vi /etc/hosts
      #  
      ip   crab2died
      ```   
## Hadoop
   1. Hadoop
      ```bash
      cd ~
      sudo tar -zxf ~/Downloads/hadoop-2.8.5.tar.gz -C /usr/local # /usr/local
      cd /usr/local/                                              
      chmod -R 777 ./hadoop-2.8.5                                 # 
      ```
   2. Hadoop
      ```bash
      sudo vi /etc/profile
      # 
      export HADOOP_HOME=/usr/local/hadoop-2.8.5 
      export PATH=$PATH:${HADOOP_HOME}/sbin:${HADOOP_HOME}/bin
      # 
      source /etc/profile
      ```
   3. Hadoop
      ```bash
      hadoop version    # 
      ```
   4. 
      `${HADOOP_HOME}/etc/hadoop`
      -  hadoop-env.sh  
         `export JAVA_HOME=${JAVA_HOME}``export JAVA_HOME=/usr/local/jdk1.8.0_181  # JDK`
      -  core-site.xml    
         ```xml
         <configuration>
             <property>
                 <name>hadoop.tmp.dir</name>
                 <value>file:/home/crab2died/hadoop/tmp</value>
                 <description>Abase for other temporary directories.</description>
             </property>
             <property>
                 <name>fs.defaultFS</name>
                 <value>hdfs://crab2died:9000</value>
             </property>
         </configuration>
         ```  
      -  hdfs-site.xml
         ```xml
         <configuration>
            <property>
                <name>dfs.nameservices</name>
                <value>hadoop-cluster</value>
            </property>
            <property>
                <name>dfs.replication</name>
                <value>1</value>
            </property>      
            <property>
                <name>dfs.namenode.name.dir</name>
                <value>file:/home/crab2died/hadoop/hdfs/nn</value>
            </property>
            <property>
                <name>dfs.namenode.checkpoint.dir</name>
                <value>file:/home/crab2died/hadoop/hdfs/snn</value>
            </property>
            <property>
                <name>dfs.namenode.checkpoint.edits.dir</name>
                <value>file:/home/crab2died/hadoop/hdfs/snn</value>
            </property>
            <property>
                <name>dfs.datanode.data.dir</name>
                <value>file:/home/crab2died/hadoop/hdfs/dn</value>
            </property>
         </configuration>
         ```
      - `cp mapred-site.xml.template mapred-site.xml`, mapred-site.xml
         ```xml
         <configuration>
             <property>
                  <name>mapreduce.framework.name</name>
                  <value>yarn</value>
             </property>
         </configuration>
         ```
      -  yarn-site.xml
         ```xml
         <configuration>
            <property>
                <name>yarn.resourcemanager.hostname</name>
                <value>crab2died</value>
            </property>
            <property>
                <name>yarn.nodemanager.aux-services</name>
                <value>mapreduce_shuffle</value>
            </property>
            <property>
                <name>yarn.nodemanager.local-dirs</name>
                <value>file:/home/crab2died/hadoop/yarn/nm</value>
            </property>
         </configuration>
         ```
   5. HDFS NameNode
      ```bash
      hdfs namenode -format
      ```
   6. 
      - HDFS
         ```bash
         hadoop-daemon.sh start namenode
         hadoop-daemon.sh start datanode
         hadoop-daemon.sh start secondarynamenode  # 
         ```
      - YARN
         ```bash
         yarn-daemon.sh start resourcemanager
         yarn-daemon.sh start nodemanager
         ```
   7. jps  
      ![hadoop jps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Crab2died/big-data-stack/master/docs/imgs/hadoop-jps.png)
   8. HDFS:  
      [http://crab2died:50070](http://crab2died:50070)
   9. YARN:  
      [http://crab2died:8088](http://crab2died:8088)

Post.title: Pseudo Distributed Hbase Install
Post.author: Crab2Died
Post._content:
## 
### UbuntuJDK8Hadoop2.8.5HBase2.1.0
   [Ubuntu](https://www.ubuntu.com/download/desktop);
   [JDK,](https://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html);
   [Hadoop2.8.5](http://hadoop.apache.org/)
   [HBase2.1.0](http://hbase.apache.org/)

### 
   Hadoop: [Hadoop ](https://github.com/Crab2died/big-data-stack/blob/master/docs/Hadoop%E4%BC%AA%E5%88%86%E5%B8%83%E5%BC%8F%E9%83%A8%E7%BD%B2.md)
   
### HBase
   1. HBase
      ```bash
      cd ~
      sudo tar -zxf ~/Downloads/hbase-2.1.0-bin.tar.gz -C /usr/local # /usr/local
      cd /usr/local/                                              
      chmod -R 777 ./hbase-2.1.0                                     # 
      ```
   2. HBase
      ```bash
      export HBASE_HOME=//usr/local/hbase-2.1.0
      export HBASE_CONF_DIR=${HBASE_HOME}/conf
      export HBASE_CLASS_PATH=${HBASE_CONF_DIR}
      export PATH=$PATH:${HBASE_HOME}/bin
      ```
   3. ${HBASE_HOME}/conf/hbase-evn.sh
      ```bash
      # 
      export JAVA_HOME=/usr/local/jdk1.8.0_181  # JDK
      export HBASE_MANAGES_ZK=true              # HBasezookeeper
      ```
   4. ${HBASE_HOME}/conf/hbase-site.xml
      ```xml
      <configuration>
          <property>
              <name>hbase.rootdir</name>
              <value>hdfs://crab2died:9000</value>
          </property>
          <property> 
              <name>hbase.cluster.distributed</name>
              <value>true</value> 
          </property>
      </configuration>
      ```
   5. ${HBASE_HOME}/conf/regionservers
      `localhost``crab2died`
   6. HBase master
      ```bash
      # cp 
      cd /usr/local/hbase-2.1.0
      cp ./lib/client-facing-thirdparty/htrace-core-3.1.0-incubating.jar ./lib
      ```
   7. 
      ```bash
      hbase version
      # 
      ```
### HBase
   1. Hadoop,: [Hadoop ](https://github.com/Crab2died/big-data-stack/blob/master/docs/Hadoop%E4%BC%AA%E5%88%86%E5%B8%83%E5%BC%8F%E9%83%A8%E7%BD%B2.md)
   2. HBase
      ```bash
      start-hbase.sh 
      ```
   3. jps  
      ![hbase jps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Crab2died/big-data-stack/master/docs/imgs/hbase-jps.png)
   4. HBase:  
      [http://crab2died:16030](http://crab2died:16030)
   5. :  
      ```bash
      hbase shell
      ```
